00001 // MeCab -- Yet Another Part-of-Speech and Morphological Analyzer

00007 #include <fstream>
00008 #include "context_id.h"
00009 #include "iconv_utils.h"
00010 #include "utils.h"
00011 
00012 namespace {
00013 
00014 using namespace MeCab;
00015 
00016 bool open_map(const char *filename,
00017               std::map<std::string, int> *cmap,
00018               Iconv *iconv) {
00019   std::ifstream ifs(filename);
00020   CHECK_DIE(ifs) << "no such file or directory: " << filename;
00021   cmap->clear();
00022   char *col[2];
00023   std::string line;
00024   while (std::getline(ifs, line)) {
00025     CHECK_DIE(2 == tokenize2(const_cast<char *>(line.c_str()),
00026                              " \t", col, 2))
00027         << "format error: " << line;
00028     std::string pos = col[1];
00029     if (iconv) {
00030       iconv->convert(&pos);
00031     }
00032     cmap->insert(std::make_pair<std::string, int>
00033                  (pos, std::atoi(col[0])));
00034   }
00035   return true;
00036 }
00037 
00038 bool build(std::map<std::string, int> *cmap,
00039            const std::string &bos) {
00040   int id = 1;  // for BOS/EOS
00041   for (std::map<std::string, int>::iterator it = cmap->begin();
00042        it != cmap->end();
00043        ++it) it->second = id++;
00044   cmap->insert(std::make_pair(bos, 0));
00045   return true;
00046 }
00047 
00048 bool save(const char* filename,
00049           std::map<std::string, int> *cmap) {
00050   std::ofstream ofs(filename);
00051   CHECK_DIE(ofs) << "permission denied: " << filename;
00052   for (std::map<std::string, int>::const_iterator it = cmap->begin();
00053        it != cmap->end(); ++it) {
00054     ofs << it->second << " " << it->first << std::endl;
00055   }
00056   return true;
00057 }
00058 }
00059 
00060 namespace MeCab {
00061 
00062 void ContextID::clear() {
00063   left_.clear();
00064   right_.clear();
00065   left_bos_.clear();
00066   right_bos_.clear();
00067 }
00068 
00069 void ContextID::add(const char *l, const char *r) {
00070   left_.insert(std::make_pair(std::string(l), 1));
00071   right_.insert(std::make_pair(std::string(r), 1));
00072 }
00073 
00074 void ContextID::addBOS(const char *l, const char *r) {
00075   left_bos_ = l;
00076   right_bos_ = r;
00077 }
00078 
00079 bool ContextID::save(const char* lfile,
00080                      const char* rfile) {
00081   return (::save(lfile, &left_) && ::save(rfile, &right_));
00082 }
00083 
00084 bool ContextID::open(const char *lfile,
00085                      const char *rfile,
00086                      Iconv *iconv) {
00087   return (::open_map(lfile, &left_, iconv) &&
00088           ::open_map(rfile, &right_, iconv));
00089 }
00090 
00091 bool ContextID::build() {
00092   return (::build(&left_, left_bos_) && ::build(&right_, right_bos_));
00093 }
00094 
00095 int ContextID::lid(const char *l) const {
00096   std::map<std::string, int>::const_iterator it = left_.find(l);
00097   CHECK_DIE(it != left_.end())
00098       << "cannot find LEFT-ID  for " << l;
00099   return it->second;
00100 }
00101 
00102 int ContextID::rid(const char *r) const {
00103   std::map<std::string, int>::const_iterator it = right_.find(r);
00104   CHECK_DIE(it != right_.end())
00105       << "cannot find RIGHT-ID  for " << r;
00106   return it->second;
00107 }
00108 }
